div.p: For us we look for people really that are dedicated, people who have got good communication skills, people who can think on their feet
and people that really want to sort of engage on a day-to-day basis with individuals. In our industry, really, we’re not looking for
qualifications, to be honest with you, what we’re really looking for is individuals that really can actually go out there and express themselves
and actually give the customer a good quality service. We provide all the training but that’s the first thing we look for because
not everybody is going to make a good security person, you know you don’t need, let’s say, to have high qualifications to be a
security person but you do need what I would call the quality, sort of, communication skills and that will actually go a long way in our industry.
